meanings.sent1: The romanised text was easy to read for the students.
meanings.sent2: The book had a romanised title on the cover.
meanings.sent3: The romanised street signs made navigation simple for tourists.
meanings.sent4: Her romanised name stood out on the list of participants.
meanings.sent5: The romanised characters were neatly printed on the page.

meanings.definition: To transcribe into the Roman alphabet.
meanings.sent1: She romanised the ancient text for her research project.
meanings.sent2: The translator romanised the foreign words for better understanding.
meanings.sent3: He romanised the song lyrics, turning them into a catchy tune.
meanings.sent4: The teacher romanised the poem, making it easier to analyze.
meanings.sent5: They romanised the document to share it with a wider audience.
